# What is the fitdistrib package? 

This package is a set a functions developed with the FlomKart flood frequency analysis project at NVE.
It allows estimated probability distribution parameters for the following distributions and estimation methods:


Those results of this package are used in the `FlomKart`package ([doc](http://NVE.github.io/FlomKart) and [code](http://github.com/NVE/FlomKart)) to build 2 NetCDF files which can then be explored with the NASA's NetCDF viewer [Panoply](http://www.giss.nasa.gov/tools/panoply/) or by our dedicated FlomKart shiny app ([doc](http://NVE.github.io/FlomKart_ShinyApp) and [code](http://github.com/NVE/FlomKart_ShinyApp)).

# How was it coded?

In [Package Ref](http://NVE.github.io/fitdistrib/rd.html), you'll find the documentation of all the packaged functions.
This package uses the existing R packages `nsRFA`, `evd`, `ismev`, `fitdistrplus` and `stats`. The use of functions from those packages is adapted to our context. Some new fitting functions were also implemented when not already available.
